SEARCH
Package org.nejjari.hanae.gameup.web.rest

Class UserRestController

java.lang.Object
org.nejjari.hanae.gameup.web.SuperRestController<UserDto,UserService>
org.nejjari.hanae.gameup.web.rest.UserRestController
@RestController @RequestMapping("/user") public class UserRestController extends SuperRestController<UserDto,UserService>
REST controller for managing User entities.

This controller provides endpoints for user-related operations such as login verification, retrieving users by name, and checking for user existence. It extends the generic SuperRestController to inherit standard RESTful behavior.

  • Method Details

    • verifyLogin

      @PostMapping("/verify") public Boolean verifyLogin(@RequestBody UserDto dto)
      Verifies the login credentials of a user.
      Parameters:
      dto - the UserDto containing login credentials
      Returns:
      true if credentials are valid, false otherwise

    • getUserByNom

      @GetMapping("/get-by-nom") public UserDto getUserByNom(@RequestParam("nom") String nom)
      Retrieves a user by their name.
      Parameters:
      nom - the name of the user
      Returns:
      the UserDto corresponding to the given name

    • existByNom

      @GetMapping("/exist-by-nom") public Boolean existByNom(@RequestParam("nom") String nom)
      Checks if a user exists by their name.
      Parameters:
      nom - the name of the user
      Returns:
      true if a user with the given name exists, false otherwise
